subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Kirk made a par-saving 7-foot putt after an errant tee shot on the 18th hole at the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial and winning by a stroke.
snippet: Kirk made a par-saving 7-foot putt after an errant tee shot on the 18th hole at the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial and winning by a stroke.
